Class Memento

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.toolsManager.Memento
public class Memento extends Object
Represents a Memento for saving and restoring the state of game entities. The `Memento` class is used to capture and store the state of different entities (Player, Monster, ConsumableItem) to allow restoration at a later time.
